**Chromatic dragon scales** are a type of [body armor](/wiki/Body_armor "Body armor") that appear in [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"). They are made of [dragon hide](/wiki/Dragon_hide "Dragon hide") like all [dragon scales](/wiki/Dragon_scales "Dragon scales").

## Generation

Chromatic dragon scales are not randomly generated, though they can be found in [bones](/wiki/Bones "Bones"); [wishing](/wiki/Wish "Wish") for them with will give the character a random set of dragon scales instead.

[Tiamat](/wiki/Tiamat "Tiamat") is guaranteed to drop chromatic dragon scales alongside her corpse upon death. A [chromatic dragon](/wiki/Chromatic_dragon_\(UnNetHack\) "Chromatic dragon (UnNetHack)") that leaves a [corpse](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse") (i.e. always) has a 1⁄6 chance of dropping chromatic dragon scales upon death, and will never drop scales if revived via [undead turning](/wiki/Undead_turning "Undead turning").

## Description

While worn, chromatic dragon scales confer 1 base AC and several properties: [fire resistance](/wiki/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance"), [cold resistance](/wiki/Cold_resistance "Cold resistance"), [shock resistance](/wiki/Shock_resistance "Shock resistance"), [sleep resistance](/wiki/Sleep_resistance "Sleep resistance"), [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance"), [disintegration resistance](/wiki/Disintegration_resistance "Disintegration resistance"), [acid resistance](/wiki/Acid_resistance "Acid resistance"), [stoning resistance](/wiki/Stoning_resistance "Stoning resistance"), [reflection](/wiki/Reflection "Reflection"), and [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance"). Reading a non-cursed [scroll of enchant armor](/wiki/Scroll_of_enchant_armor "Scroll of enchant armor") that targets worn chromatic dragon scales convert them into [chromatic dragon scale mail](/wiki/Chromatic_dragon_scale_mail_\(UnNetHack\) "Chromatic dragon scale mail (UnNetHack)"), with a blessed scroll adding a point of [enchantment](/wiki/Enchantment "Enchantment").

Uncontrolled [polymorph](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") while wearing chromatic dragon scales will turn the wearer into a chromatic dragon - in practice, only [quaffing](/wiki/Quaff "Quaff") a [potion of polymorph](/wiki/Potion_of_polymorph "Potion of polymorph") or [zapping](/wiki/Zapping "Zapping") a [wand of polymorph](/wiki/Wand_of_polymorph "Wand of polymorph") at yourself will do this. This is one of the only ways in the game for a character or monster to polymorph into a chromatic dragon.

## Strategy

Chromatic dragon scales are very hard to obtain, but are well worth the trouble for the chance to make them into chromatic dragon scale mail, which is easily one of the best non-artifact armors in the game.

Chromatic dragon scales are a type of body armor that appear in UnNetHack. They are made of dragon hide like all dragon scales.

Generation

Chromatic dragon scales are not randomly generated, though they can be found in bones; wishing for them with will give the character a random set of dragon scales instead.

Tiamat is guaranteed to drop chromatic dragon scales alongside her corpse upon death. A chromatic dragon that leaves a corpse (i.e. always) has a 1⁄6 chance of dropping chromatic dragon scales upon death, and will never drop scales if revived via undead turning.

Description

While worn, chromatic dragon scales confer 1 base AC and several properties: fire resistance, cold resistance, shock resistance, sleep resistance, poison resistance, disintegration resistance, acid resistance, stoning resistance, reflection, and magic resistance. Reading a non-cursed scroll of enchant armor that targets worn chromatic dragon scales convert them into chromatic dragon scale mail, with a blessed scroll adding a point of enchantment.

Uncontrolled polymorph while wearing chromatic dragon scales will turn the wearer into a chromatic dragon - in practice, only quaffing a potion of polymorph or zapping a wand of polymorph at yourself will do this. This is one of the only ways in the game for a character or monster to polymorph into a chromatic dragon.

Strategy

Chromatic dragon scales are very hard to obtain, but are well worth the trouble for the chance to make them into chromatic dragon scale mail, which is easily one of the best non-artifact armors in the game.
